phrases: At the time, three years after their debut,
Trapnest had reached a million in sales, both in the singles and album charts.
Their vocalist, Reira, was in a class of her own
with a voice quality and range exceptional for a Japanese singer.
Ren wrote almost all of their songs.
That day, for all two hours of the show,
my eyes were on Ren the whole time as if he was performing on his own.
I kept sending him telepathic waves
hoping that he would sense Nana's presence.
At times I felt Ren was looking this way,
but in an instant his eyes would wander off elsewhere.
When I was darkness at that time
With trembling lips
The more I struggle
The more this wound deepens
The broken promise hurt me
Nobody can save me
God, I have only one request
Stop tearing apart my love
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I am a broken rose
I want to need your love
Is he unreachable?
After coming all the way here?
Thank you very much.
Encore!
Encore!
Encore!
Encore!
The fans were great today.
They were really into our performance.
Is this their national identity?
You mean prefectural identity.
We are not on a world tour.
Please, do not bother talking to the audience on stage, Naoki.
It exposes your lack of intelligence.
Let us add songs to our encore.
Two more songs do not feel like enough.
But we have not rehearsed any others.
Do not be ridiculous.
That will be impossible.
We are approaching our time limit here.
We are not renting this hall for free, you know.
For a manager, you can be real stingy, Take.
Reira, you should not talk either.
Hey, Ren, you know you made a mistake in the second song.
You might have thought you got away with it,
but that was pretty obvious...
Where are you going, Ren?
Toilet!
Where did he make a mistake?
I did not notice anything.
So even Ren can make a mistake, I guess.
Notice it, damn it.
What is it with our band members?
Encore!
Encore!
Encore!
Encore!
Has not Ren noticed that you are here?
He is not likely able to see the audience at all with all those spotlights.
Really?
Well, I cannot speak from experience.
I have never performed on a stage this big.
No way!
He cannot see us?
Maybe.
But we are sitting in the first row.
Cannot he see a little?
Oh, this may be a trap set up by the Demon Lord.
It must feel really good, singing in such a big place.
You will be able to...
Being you, Nana, I am sure you will.
The band BLAST will surpass Trapnest!
Yes.
Yasu, Nana's here!
Right.
Is the concert over already?
It is not over.
We are about to go out for the encore.
Well, good luck with that.
You knew about this, did not you?
Why did not you tell me?
I wanted it to be a surprise.
Then you succeeded.
I even made a mistake on stage.
Although I faked it with a little rearrangement.
Really?
That is even more than I could have asked for.
It is not a laughing matter!
If it were in Tokyo, that is one thing,
but what is she doing here out in the country?
Not to mention the front row.
Then jump off the stage and embrace her.
You cannot expect me to do that!
Ren!
What are you shouting about?
Do not lose it yet, we are not done with the performance!
We are going out for the encore!
Go.
I will email you the cell number of the girl Nana's with.
If you want to see Nana, call that number.
How can I face her after what happened?
I am tired of hearing you say that.
You can be such a drag sometimes.
If you do not intend to see her...
I will take Nana for myself.
Ren, we are going!
Dinner is ready.
They played two songs for the encore.
Ren did not glance over this way even once.
This is making me really nervous, having a meal with such a cute girl.
A cute girl?
What are you saying, dad?
You perverted old man.
What!
You are one to talk, with that Tarzan outfit.
- Tarzan? - Go back to the jungle!
It was as if I had awakened from a dream.
We were reminded once and for all that Ren is now a superstar
and out of our reach.
It made me feel miserable.
That was refreshing.
The bath's available if you want to take a bath, Nana.
I left towels out for you.
Sure.
Thanks.
Oh, darn!
I forgot to switch it back on.
YASU
YASU Yasu?
YASU
That is unusual.
What could it be?
Ren might be giving you a call.
Nana!
Big news!
You know, you should not barge in like that while someone is taking a bath...
But this really is big news!
Another murder somewhere?
No!
Look here!
Yasu sent me an e-mail!
Yasu?
I am sorry, Nana.
I had forgotten to switch my phone back on.
Because it had to be switched off while at the concert hall?
It is past midnight.
He may have tried to call.
What is the meaning of this?
Why would Yasu?
I do not know.
Maybe Yasu gave Ren my number.
But Ren was unreachable, was not he?
I do not really understand, but what should we do?
Call Yasu.
- Hello. - Hello, Yasu.
It is me.
Hello, Nana.
Sorry about giving out your number without asking.
No problem.
Did Ren call?
I am not sure.
Huh?
Did you check your missed calls?
I forgot to turn the phone back on after the concert.
- What? - I wonder if Ren's already called.
Who knows?
What will I do?
Just wait and I am sure he will call again.
Really?
Probably.
I provoked him a bit.
Do not joke around, baldy!
I do not know what you told Ren, but mind your own business.
I have nothing to say to him at this point.
Well, let me make one thing clear.
It was he who called me after noticing you at the concert hall.
I just gave him the phone number.
If you have nothing to say to him, tell him that directly.
If you have no need for the key to the place you and Ren used to live,
and the key to the padlock around Ren's neck, just get rid of them.
That would put an end to everything.
Put yourself in his shoes.
He is bound by a woman he can never have again.
I understand.
Give me Ren's cell number.
I am not the type to just sit around and wait.
FROM: YASU GOOD JOB NANA KOMATSU'S NUMBER
If you do not intend to see her, I will take Nana for myself.
Ren!
Hey, give me one too.
Come on.
Oh, never mind.
I cannot sleep so I am going to Takumi's room to play cards.
Want To come?
Cards again?
Yes.
We are playing Shichi Narabe again.
Not the image of rock musicians, is it?
I am fine.
I will pass.
Being a rock musician and all.
Let us play!
It is no fun without you.
Takumi, Naoki and Take are all lousy players.
It is no fun winning all the games.
Sorry, but I am really tired.
I am going to bed.
Good night.
Is that so?
Darn.
Reira.
Huh?
Your voice is a bit rough.
You okay?
Let us do our best, okay?
Sixteen to go.
Who is it?
Nana.
What a way to greet me.
You seem to be well.
I have something to talk to you about.
Can we meet now?
Sure.
Where are you now?
In my hotel room.
Alone?
Yeah.
Would it be unwise for me to go there?
No.
If you would rather meet me outside somewhere, just tell me where.
No, that would be less convenient.
It does not look like I will be able to leave here.
Then I am coming right now.
What hotel and what is the room number?
So many fans...
They have found out where the band's staying.
No wonder he cannot go out.
What does Nana plan to do once she meets Ren?
What is she going to tell him?
Nana's really stubborn, which worries me.
I am so worried it is not likely I will get any sleep.
Good job.
Are you a staff member?
Show me your pass.
Oh, my pass?
It must be tough, having to check passes here as well.
Oh?
I think I left it in my room.
I will go get it.
This area is off limits to the public.
It is a real problem.
Do you have any idea
how much trouble obsessed fans like you because the band members?
I am not really a fan!
Now go on.
Go on home.
I asked that girl to come.
Please let her through.
Here is a little payment to keep it a secret.
Oh, is that so?
Well, sorry'bout that.
The security's really tight.
Sorry, maybe I should not have come.
Ren...
Let me go!
I have no intention of getting back together with you!
I wanted to see you.
I should not have come.
You are ingenious, Yasu.
Knowing Nana, naturally she is going to feel the need to give the keys back to Ren
after what you told her.
Hey, I will take that!
Pon.
But if she gives him the keys, it would be over between them?
If she really wanted to end it with him,
she would not go through the trouble of meeting him just to hand over some keys.
It just gives them an excuse to meet.
They are man and woman.
Let that take care of the rest.
Shin, not that I care, but you have been acting saucy lately.
Do not be so snobbish.
- Oh, that is Ron for me!
- Huh?!
Did I win?
He is good.
You tricked me.
You are so not cute.
Mahjongg is so much fun.
Next time we should play with four people.
Does Nana play too?
Yeah.
We used to play a four-person game a lot
when Ren was around.
Say, let us ask Ren over next time.
Really?
I can meet Ren?!
I want to see him!
I want to see him too!
Why is it you are always secretly meeting Ren behind my back?
I am always left out.
Ren does not have the guts to see you.
Huh?
So he feels guilty about leaving BLAST.
He initially declined Trapnest's offer, you know.
Then Takumi gave me a call.
I was the one who persuaded Ren to join.
Still, he feels that he betrayed us.
There is no need for him to fuss over something that happened in the past.
It does not suit him.
But that is Ren for you.
Can a guy so awkward with people
really make it in the brutal world of entertainment?
It worries me.
Well, in that case, why do not I send him an email?
An invitation to a mahjongg tournament.
Yay!
He will be so happy that he will cry.
By the way, Yasu, you said you provoked Ren on the phone.
I reached into the sky By the way, Yasu, you said you provoked Ren on the phone.
I reached into the sky
I reached into the sky What did you say?
I reached into the sky
I reached into the sky What tactics did you use?
Tell me so I can learn for myself.
What tactics did you use?
Tell me so I can learn for myself.
But I could not reach what I wanted What tactics did you use?
Tell me so I can learn for myself.
But I could not reach what I wanted
But I could not reach what I wanted I do not really have any tactics.
But I could not reach what I wanted
But I could not reach what I wanted Cannot you tell the level of my stupidity?
But I could not reach what I wanted
But I could not reach what I wanted But you are really smart!
Unlike Nobu.
But you are really smart!
Unlike Nobu.
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky But you are really smart!
Unlike Nobu.
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky It is not about how smart I am.
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
Like colorful balloons
You still have a lot to learn.
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
My hand had no place to go Back then, I thought I would never want to fall in love again.
Back then, I thought I would never want to fall in love again.
And gently you took it Back then, I thought I would never want to fall in love again.
And gently you took it
And gently you took it But that night, I wanted to dream again.
But that night, I wanted to dream again.
Starless night
But that night, I wanted to dream again.
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
But that night, I wanted to dream again.
I will not look back at the shadow of my past I wanted to love someone from the bottom of my heart,
I wanted to love someone from the bottom of my heart,
I want to feel your warmth I wanted to love someone from the bottom of my heart,
I want to feel your warmth
I want to feel your warmth no matter how I may get hurt, no matter how I may suffer.
That is what I felt that night, Nana, while praying for your happiness.
Tears are falling down
That is what I felt that night, Nana, while praying for your happiness.
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
That is what I felt that night, Nana, while praying for your happiness.
That is what I felt that night, Nana, while praying for your happiness.
Of your hand holding mine
That is what I felt that night, Nana, while praying for your happiness.
Of your hand holding mine
Starless night
Even if your lips spill weak words
I want to believe in your warmth
Endless love
I even love your contradictions
You are my shining star
